ai-tha-ap479:1.2_0: to the master of the mind;
ai-tha-ap479:2.2_0: to see the word of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap479:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap479:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap479:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap479:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nakula’s father.
ai-tha-ap479:7.1_0: The seventh, the senior, the middle of the senior monks.
